content: **the polar bear mittens** pattern is a free beginner-friendly design worked in two colors these mittens are inspired by the icy scenery of the svalbard archipelago adult sizing generous fit adjust yarn aran to dk or sport-weight and/or needles for smaller sizes the sample measurements are width approx 10 cm and length approx 25 cm **gauge ** 28 stitches and 28 row = 10 x 10 cm using 3 5 mm needles **yarn ** the pattern calls for aran-weight yarn the sample is made with novita 7 veljestä approx 200 m / 100 g in the colorways navy 170 and sand 60 other suitable options include among others drops karisma and sandnes garn smart for the standard size the yarn requirement is approximately 100 grams **you will need ** 2 5 mm and 3 5 mm needles a yarn needle scissors and blocking pins **techniques include ** two-color knitting/stranded colorwork increases decreases catching long floats working a thumb gusset and top shaping crown decreases i ve only had a few test knitters so if you notice any errors typos or parts that could be phrased differently please let me know
